about_the_game:
Paper Bride2 Zangling Village-Sound Track contains a total of 4 original tracks, 2 of which are sung by real people.
The republican version and modern version of "This Life and the Next" and the corresponding accompaniment, the original disc mastering level lossless audio, the file in 2304kbps code rate WAV file format.
Thank you for your support of the Paper Bride series of games, and we hope that you will be captivated by our music while experiencing the game.
detailed_description:
Paper Bride2 Zangling Village-Sound Track contains a total of 4 original tracks, 2 of which are sung by real people.
The republican version and modern version of "This Life and the Next" and the corresponding accompaniment, the original disc mastering level lossless audio, the file in 2304kbps code rate WAV file format.
Thank you for your support of the Paper Bride series of games, and we hope that you will be captivated by our music while experiencing the game.
name: Paper Bride2  Zangling Village-Sound Track

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6550 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440（512M）or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: I3 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX560se or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Paper Bride2 Zangling Village-Sound Track contains a total of 4 original tracks, 2 of which are sung by real people. The republican version and modern version of "This Life and the Next" and the corresponding accompaniment.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese, Thai, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Vietnamese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
